Translations.Text: wang-gug-eul soyuhago gyesineun ha nanimkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo sillo geu bun-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneunghasim-ila
jug-eumgwa saengmyeong-eul jejeonghasieo geugeos-eulo neohuiga seon-eul haenghaneunji si heomhagoja hasini geubun-eun gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila

geubun-eun chilcheon-eul cheung-eulo hayeo chalyelo changjohasyeossnola neohuineun geugeos-i wanjeonmugyeolhayeo mueoshana gyeolham-ieobs-eum-eul bol geos-ini dasi hanbeon nun-euldollyeobola gyeolham-eul bol su issgessneunyo
geuleon hu dasi hanbeon nun-eul deul-eobola pigonhayeo issdeon nun-i gyeomsonha go sunjonghan silyeog-eulo dol-aolila

sillo hananim-eun gajang naj-eun ha neul-eul deungbulloseo jangsighayeossgo geu geos-eulo satan-eul mullichim-e yuyonghagehayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-eul wihae taoleuneun buljiog-ui eungbeol-eul junbihasyeossdoda
junim-eul midji anihan jadeul-eul wihaeseo saaghan eungbeol-i issnani
geudeul-i geugos-eulo deonjyeojil ttae geudeul-eun sin-eumsoli gat-eun museoun bi tan-ui solileul deul-eul geos-ila
jiog-eun bunnohayeo pogbalhal geos-ini bulsinjaui muliga deonjyeojil ttae mada neohuiege han gyeong-gojaga ileuji ani haess-eossneunyo lago suhojaga jil munhal geos-ila

sillo jeohuiege han gyeong-gojaga dolaehayeoss-euna jeohuiga geuleul geoyeog haessseubnida hananim-eun amu geosdo gye sihaji anihaessseubnida dangsindeul-eun keuge banghwanghago iss-eul ppun-ibnida lago malhadeola
deohayeo malhagil uliga gwileulgiul-yeossdamyeon ttoneun suggo haessdeolamyeon ulineun taoleuneun buljiog-ui donglyojung-e issji anihaess-eul tende lago malhadeola
geudeul-eun joeagdeul-eul gobaeghana taoleuneun buljiog-ui donglyodeullobuteo yongseoga doeji anhnola
geuleona boiji anihan junim-eul dulyeowo han jadeul-egeneun gwan-yong-gwa keun bosang-i issnola
neohuiga sumgieo malhaneun geosgwa deuleonaeeo malhaneun geosdo hananim-eun ma-eumsog-ui modeun geos-eul asim-eulo chung manhasinila
geubun-i changjohan geos-eul geubun-i moleulli issneunyo sillo geubun-eun sinbi han modeun geos-eul ihaehasigo asineun bun-isila
